author: Lloyd Minor
title: For Children in the Hospital, VR May Be the Cure for Anxiety
text: Lloyd B. Minor is dean of the Stanford University School of Medicine. He is also a professor of otolaryngologyâ€“head and neck surgery and a professor of bioengineering and of neurobiology, by courtesy. While a 9-year-old boy recovered last year from a go-karting accident, the bandages on his wounds needed changing once a day. It was One Way Hospitals (and Patients) Can Improve Emergency Care
